byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: In a regulatory filing, Formation 8 said it would aim to raise up to $400 million for a special investment vehicle to finance new companies in Asia.

headline.main: Venture Capital Firm Formation 8 Creates Vehicle Focused on Asian Start-Ups

snippet: In a regulatory filing, Formation 8 said it would aim to raise up to $400 million for a special investment vehicle to finance new companies in Asia.
